name: Card Game Clone - Intro to Game Dev Project 3_1
name_original: Card Game Clone - Intro to Game Dev Project 3_1
description:
This is Project 3 part 1 of the 2022 Fall NYU Intro to Game Dev class, the clone of Card Game.

Click the left mouse button to deal a card. Get a higher score as you can!

  • Score font: BM Jua
  • Other assets: Record & draw by myself
